db:abstract.db:para: The QAccessibleTextInsertEvent class notifies of text being inserted.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This class is used with QAccessible::updateAccessibility().

db:section.db:title: QAccessibleTextInsertEvent::QAccessibleTextInsertEvent(QObject *object, int position, const QString &text)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new QAccessibleTextInsertEvent event for object. The text has been inserted at position. By default, it is assumed that the cursor has moved to the end of the selection. If that is not the case, one needs to manually set it with QAccessibleTextCursorEvent::setCursorPosition() for this event.

db:section.db:title: int QAccessibleTextInsertEvent::changePosition() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the position where the text was inserted.

db:section.db:title: QString QAccessibleTextInsertEvent::textInserted() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the text that has been inserted.
